content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Hello Nesibe, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for coming to see our apartment.

Our goal is to ensure that we get the highest possible rental price for the apartment. We would like to know what you are willing to pay for a 25-square-meter apartment in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 500 Euro per month.

TERMINATE.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. We appreciate your interest, but we are unable to accept this price. We are looking for a higher rental price to maximize our gains. If you have any other offers, please let us know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 600 Euro per month.

TERMINATE.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia
